greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, A027293 * (A152537 * 0^(n-k))
comment: Right border = A152537, left border = A000041.
formula: Triangle read by rows, M*Q. M = A027293 as an infinite lower triangular matrix with the partition numbers (A000041) in every column. Q = a matrix with A152537 as the main diagonal and the rest zeros.
